==== Notes ====
Lid requires some extra tweaking to get working on a 5100. The radeontool package needs to be installed, uncomment the "RADEON_LIGHT=true" line in /etc/default/acpi-support, and add the "acpi_irq_balance" option to the Ubuntu entry in GRUB.
